member.summary: Creates a new .

member.summary: GET: Lists notes for the current user or all notes for administrators.

member.summary: GET: Details for a single note.
member.returns: The details view or NotFound/Forbid as appropriate.

member.name: M:NotesApp.Controllers.NotesController.Create
member.summary: GET: Show create note form.

member.name: M:NotesApp.Controllers.NotesController.Create(NotesApp.Models.ViewModels.CreateNoteViewModel)
member.summary: POST: Create a new note for the current user and attach tags.
member.returns: Redirects to Index on success, otherwise returns the view with validation errors.

member.name: M:NotesApp.Controllers.NotesController.Edit(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: GET: Edit form for a note.
member.returns: Edit view or NotFound/Forbid as appropriate.

member.name: M:NotesApp.Controllers.NotesController.Edit(NotesApp.Models.Note)
member.summary: POST: Apply edits to a note. Only title and content are updatable.
member.param: Note input containing Id, Title and Content.
member.returns: Redirects to Index on success or NotFound/Forbid.
